snippet: Rafael Nadal said he would try antibiotics rather than have surgery to control his appendicitis so he can get through the Shanghai Masters this week.
abstract: Rafael Nadal will postpone surgery and undergo treatment with antibiotics to control his appendicitis so that he can finish the Shanghai Masters; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: Rafael Nadal said he would try antibiotics rather than have surgery to control his appendicitis so he can get through the Shanghai Masters this week.

headline.main: Nadal to Play in Shanghai Despite Appendicitis
